item.title: Evernote is unveiling new additions to the Pfeiffer Collection of desktop accessories
item.description:
Evernote has expanded its Pfeiffer Collection, a line of modern desktop accessories designed in collaboration with Eric Pfeiffer. The latest additions are bent plywood platforms crafted to securely elevate laptops, tablets, and monitors on desks, while also providing extra storage space. Source: Evernote blog. The new products include: Laptop platform: This stand, made of walnut bent ply, supports 13” or 15” laptops. A curved front trough can hold small items, and cables can be routed through the back...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/evernote-is-unveiling-new-additions-to-the-pfeiffer-collection-of-desktop-accessories/

item.title: Evernote introduces a new and improved app with a redesigned interface
item.description:
Evernote has announced three updates: a brand new app, a significantly enhanced feature, and a major app redesign. As detailed in a recent blog post, the company will introduce “Scannable,” a mobile scanning app. Scannable can transform physical items like business cards and receipts into digital content that can be easily shared and acted upon. It also integrates with the ScanSnap Evernote Edition desktop scanner, enabling shared scanning across a user’s network and essentially turning it into a shared office resource...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/evernote-introduces-a-new-and-improved-app-with-a-redesigned-interface/
